text: Micko is a documentary about Mick O'Dwyer. It first aired on RTÉ One on 8 January 2018. Loosehorse were responsible for putting it together. O'Dwyer described Eoin Liston as "a great man for the Mars bars and a packet of Smarties." O'Dwyer was 81 at the time Micko aired. ==References== Category:2018 in Gaelic football Category:2018 in Irish television Category:All-Ireland Senior Football Championship Category:Documentary films about Gaelic games Category:Documentary films about sportspeople Category:Gaelic games on television Category:Irish documentary television films Category:Kerry county football team Category:Sports television in Ireland
title: Micko
